page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
A survey was carried out round the village to see what jobs were carried out.It was found that there were a lot more helping jobs than making and farming.In fact there were 96% helping jobs 2% making and 2% farming.Out of 69 people asked 63 worked in service industries 3 in manufacturing and 3 in farming.
{Pupils who have surveyed,researched {and written this Domesday Survey are:- Andrew Maguire,Richard Allwood,Jenny Harness{(Barwick-in Elmet C.E.Junior {School).}Philip Bagley,Paul Hunter, David Brooker,Nigel Robson,Jason Farrer,Allen Worthington,Dan Campbell, Malcolm Walker,Tracy Nicholson,Joanna Oddy,Denise Davis,Sara Baxter,Julie Fisher,Iain Porter and Phillip Smith. {(Aberford C.E. J.and I. School).}
